title: Remembering John Madden, Previewing Week 17, and the Top Five People of 2021
description:
Kevin is joined by Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz to remember the late John Madden and preview some matchups for Week 17. Then they continue by discussing the top five people of 2021. 

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guests: Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
